895px;\n}\n\n</script>\n\n\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nP.register(\"DynamicIframe\", function(){\n\nfunction DynamicIframe(options) {\n  \n  var nTries = 0,\n      MAX_TRIES = 20,\n      iframeId = options.iframeId,\n      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,\n      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,\n      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,\n      iframeCSSId = \"dynamic_iframe_CSS\";\n      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;\n    \n  this.createIframe = function() {\n    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');\n    iframe.id = iframeId;\n    iframe.className = \"ap_never_hide\";\n    iframe.width = \"100%\";\n    iframe.scrolling = \"no\";\n    iframe.frameBorder = \"0\";\n    onloadFn = this.iframeload;\n    \n    if ( iframe.addEventListener )\n      iframe.addEventListener(\"load\", onloadFn, false);\n    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )\n      iframe.attachEvent(\"onload\", onloadFn);\n    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;\n    \n    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);\n    wrapper.innerHTML = '';\n    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);\n    \n    var overriddenCSS = \"\";\n    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {\n    \toverriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;\n    }\n    \n    var doc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);\n    if (doc && doc.open) {\n      doc.open();\n\n      doc.writeln('<html><head><base target=\"_top\" /></' + 'head><body><style class=\"text/css\">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id=\"iframeContent\">' + \n              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');\n      doc.close();\n    }\n  }\n  \n  this.iframeload = function () {\n    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);\n    iframe.style.display = '';\n    setTimeout(function () {\n      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);\n    }, 20); \n  }\n  \n  function getDocHeight(doc) {\n    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById(\"iframeContent\");\n    var docHeight = 0;\n    if(contentDiv){\n      docHeight = Math.max(\n        contentDiv.scrollHeight,\n        contentDiv.offsetHeight,\n        contentDiv.clientHeight\n      );\n    }\n    return docHeight;\n  }\n  \n  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {\n    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);\n    iframeDoc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);\n    if (iframeDoc) {\n      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);\n      if (h && h != 0) {\n        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';\n        if(typeof resizeCallback == \"function\") {\n          resizeCallback(iframeId);\t\n        }\n      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {\n        nTries++;\n        setTimeout(function () {\n            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);\n        }, 50);\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  \n  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {\n    nTries = 0;\n\tsetIframeHeight(resizeCallback);\n  }\n}\n\nreturn DynamicIframe;\n});\n</script>\n\n\t                \n                \n            \n        \n kcpAppDialogObj_ = jQuery('.kcpAppsPopOverDialog_');\n    var escChar = String.fromCharCode(0x5c);\n    function isValidEmail(emailAddress) {\n        //If email not supported or invalid email address return false\n        if ( parseInt(\"\") || (emailAddress && typeof emailAddress !== \"string\" )) {\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        // validating only from @ to end\n        var validator = new RegExp(escChar + \"w+@[\" + escChar +\"w\" + escChar + \"-+_]+?\" + escChar + \".[\" + escChar + \"w\" + escChar + \"-+_]+\");\n        return emailAddress.match( validator ) != null;\n    }\n    \n    function isValidPhone(phoneNumber) {\n        //If sms not supported or no input return false\n        if ( parseInt(\"\") || !phoneNumber ) {\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        var validator = new RegExp(\"^([0-9\" + escChar + \"(\" + escChar + \")\" + escChar + \"/\" + escChar + \"+\" + escChar + \"-]*)$\");\n        var digitsOnly = phoneNumber.replace(/D/g, '');\n        return digitsOnly.length >= 9 && digitsOnly.length < 20 && phoneNumber.match(validator) != null; \n    }\n    \n    function appendCountryCode(phoneNumber) {\n        var countryCode = </h2>\n        \n          <div class=\"a-section content\">\n            <h4>About auto-renewal</h4>\n            \n                <p></p><ul style=\"list-style-type: disc; margin-left: 30px;\">\n<li>\nThis blog subscription will automatically renew until you decide to cancel, at any time, using <a href=\"/gp/magazines-subscription-manager/manager/ref=msm_dp_manage\" target=\"_blank\">Magazine Subscription Manager</a>.\n</li>\n<li>\nBefore your subscription expires Amazon will notify you via e-mail of the rate at which you will renew. You may change your credit card, device information or cancel your subscription before renewal.\n</li>\n<li>\nAmazon will renew on your behalf at the lowest renewal rate then available to Amazon.com customers at the time of renewal.\n</li>\n<li>\nEach renewal term will be for a one year subscription, unless otherwise posted.\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>\n<a href=\"/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_ac?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=201293140\" target=\"_blank\">Learn more</a> about auto-renewal subscriptions on Amazon.com\n</p><p></p>\n            \n          </div>\n        \n          <div class=\"a-section content\">\n            <h4>Privacy &amp; Security</h4>\n            \n                <p>In order to complete your transaction, we will share the name, billing and shipping address and other order information associated with your purchase with the publisher or magazine vendor. Your name and address will also be shared with a circulation-auditing organization. We may share your e-mail with the publisher, but you can control how it will be used in <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/magazines-subscription-manager/manager\"> Subscription Manager. </a> We will not share your credit card information. Offers on this page are introductory. <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=hp_left_cn?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=201125850\" target=\"_blank\">See Details</a>.</p>\n \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n  \n  \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<hr noshade=\"true\" size=\"1\" class=\"bucketDivider\">\n\n<div id=\"pd-available\"></div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nvar 'product-description-iframe';\n  obj.appendTo = 'iframe-wrapper';\n  function getDocHeight (doc) {\n    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById(\"pdIframeContent\");\n    var docHeight = 0;\n    if(contentDiv){\n      docHeight = Math.max(\n        contentDiv.scrollHeight,\n        contentDiv.offsetHeight,\n        contentDiv.clientHeight\n      );\n    }\n    return docHeight;\n  }  \n  function isElementOnRight(pdRef, el) {\n    var ret=0;\n    try {\n      if(pdRef, el) {\n        if((el.offsetTop < pdRef.offsetTop) && (el.offsetTop + el.offsetHeight > pdRef.offsetTop)) {\n          ret = 1;\n        }\n      }\n    } catch (e) {}\n    return ret;\n  }\n  function setWidth(iframeRef, el) {\n    var elLeft, w, minW = 450;\n    try {\n      elLeft = el.offsetLeft;\n      w = elLeft - 50;\n      if(w > minW) {\n        iframeRef.style.width = w + 'px';\n        hasCustomWidth = 1;\n      }\n    } catch (e) {}\n  }\n  function setIframeWidth(ifrmId) {\n    var iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId),\n        pdRef = d.getElementById(\"pd-available\"),\n        rightCol = d.getElementById(\"rightCol\"),\n        rightRail = d.getElementById(\"rightRail\");\n    if(isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightRail)) {\n      setWidth(iframeRef, rightRail); \n    } else if (isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightCol)) {\n      setWidth(iframeRef, rightCol);\n    }\n  }\n  function setIframeHeight (ifrmId) {\n    var iframeDoc, iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId);\n    try {\n      iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentWindow.document;\n    } catch (e) {\n      try {\n        iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentDocument;\n      } catch (ex) {}\n    }\n    if (iframeDoc) {\n      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);\n      if (h && h != 0) {\n        iframeRef.style.height = h + 'px';\n      } else { \n        if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {\n          nTries++;\n          setTimeout(function () {\n            setIframeHeight(ifrmId);\n          }, 50); \n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  obj.iframeload = function () {\n    var iframe = d.getElementById(obj.iframeId);\n    iframe.style.display = '';\n    iframe.style.height = \"1px\";\n    setTimeout(function () {\n      if(obj.needWidthAdjust) {\n        setIframeWidth(obj.iframeId);\n      }\n      setIframeHeight(obj.iframeId);\n      var onloadCallback = obj.onloadCallback;\n      if(typeof onloadCallback === \"function\") {\n        onloadCallback();\n      }\n    }, 50); \n\n  }\n  obj.createIframe = function ( iframeId, onloadFn ) {\n    var iframe = d.createElement('iframe');\n    iframe.id = iframeId;\n    iframe.className = \"ap_never_hide\";\n    iframe.width = \"100%\";\n    iframe.scrolling=\"no\";\n    iframe.frameBorder=\"0\";\n    if ( iframe.addEventListener )\n      iframe.addEventListener(\"load\", onloadFn, false);\n    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )\n      iframe.attachEvent(\"onload\", onloadFn);\n    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;\n    return iframe; \n  }\n  obj.initialize = function (onloadCallback, needWidthAdjust) {\n    var iframeContent = \"%0A%20%20%0A%0A%0A%0A%3Chtml%3E%0A%20%20%3Chead%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%3Cstyle%20type%3D%27text%2Fcss%27%3E%0A%0A%0A%20h2%20%7B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20color%3A%23333%20%21important%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-size%3A21px%20%21important%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20line-height%3A%201.3%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20padding-bottom%3A%204px%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-weight%3A%20normal%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20font-family%3AArial%2C%20sans-serif%3B%0A%20%20%20%20%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%0A%20%7D%0A%20%20%20%20%0Abody%20%7B%0A%20%20background-color%3A%20%23FFFFFF%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%0A%20%20height%3A%20100%25%3B%0A%20%20width%3A%20100%25%3B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23333333%3B%0A%20%20word-wrap%3A%20break-word%3B%20%0A%20%20font-family%3A%20verdana%2Carial%2Chelvetica%2Csans-serif%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%20small%3B%0A%7D%0A%0Atd%2C%20th%20%7B%0A%20%20font-family%3A%20verdana%2Carial%2Chelvetica%2Csans-serif%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%20small%3B%0A%7D%0A%0Ahr%20%7B%0A%20%20border-top%3A%201px%20dashed%20%23999999%3B%0A%20%20height%3A%201px%3B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23FFFFFF%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%203px%200px%3B%0A%20%20border-style%3A%20dashed%20none%20none%20none%3B%0A%20%20background-color%3A%20white%0A%7D%0Aul%20%7B%20%0A%20%20list-style-type%3A%20none%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%3B%20%0A%20%20padding%3A%200px%3B%20%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20%7B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200.5em%200em%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20ul%20%7B%0A%20%20list-style-type%3A%20none%3B%0A%20%20margin-left%3A%2025px%3B%0A%7D%0Aul%20li%20ul%20li%20%7B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200em%3B%0A%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20%7B%20padding%3A%205px%200em%3B%20%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20div.content%20%7B%20margin%3A%200.5em%200px%200em%2025px%3B%20%7D%0Ahr%20%7B%20margin-left%3A%200px%3B%20%7D%0A.bucket%20h3%20%7B%0A%20%20color%3A%20%23000%3B%0A%20%20font-size%3A%201em%3B%0A%20%20font-weight%3A%20bold%3B%0A%20%20margin%3A%200px%200px%200.25em%200px%3B%0A%7D%0Ahr.bucketDivider%20%7B%20clear%3A%20left%3B%20%7D%0Adiv.bucket%20%7B%20padding%3A%205px%200em%3B%20%7D%0A.disclaim%20%7B%0A    obj.onloadCallback = onloadCallback;\n    obj.needWidthAdjust = needWidthAdjust;\n    var iframe = obj.createIframe (obj.iframeId, obj.iframeload);\n    var wrapper = d.getElementById(obj.appendTo);\n    wrapper.innerHTML = '';\n\n    var anchor = d.createElement('div');\n    anchor.id = 'biss-product-description-and-details';\n    wrapper.appendChild(anchor);\n\n    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);\n    var doc;\n    try {\n      doc = iframe.contentWindow.document;\n    } catch (e) {\n      try {\n        doc = iframe.contentDocument;\n      } catch (ex)    }\n  }\n  obj.resizeIframe = function() {\n    if(hasCustomWidth) {\n      setIframeWidth(obj.iframeId);\n    }\n    nTries = 1;\n    setIframeHeight(obj.iframeId);\n panelKeyHandler=onKey($link,function(){if(this.isEnter()||this.isSpace()){panel.show();}},'keydown',false);$link.focus(function(){panelKeyHandler.bind();}).blur(function(){panelKeyHandler.unbind();});panel.elem().appendTo($parent);};var hideParentAndResetTrigger=function(){hideParent();sloppyTrigger.disable();};for(var i=0;i<linkKeys.length;i++){var item=linkKeys[i];if(item.panelKey){addPanel(item.link,item.panelKey);}else{item.link.mouseover(hideParentAndResetTrigger);}}};});};\n} catch ( err ) {\n  if ( window.$Nav ) {\n    window.$Nav.when('metrics', 'logUeError').run(function(metrics, log) {\n      metrics.increment('NavJS:AboveNavInjection:error');\n      log(err.toString(), {\n        'attribution': 'rcx-nav',\n        'logLevel': 'FATAL'\n      });\n    });\n  }\n}\n</script>\n\n\n<!-- navp-MCmgxMknxe61CRL/sQznOdHeSa3qWrxymLGz69PCyXFsaVbcg2PvptMUaQ68Y4z1 rid-M259YNSG3F3F0GEF0YMJ (Fri Apr 21 22:44:07 2017) a-hidden\">\n          <div class=\"a-section a-dropdown\">\n              <div class=\"a-section a-popover-wrapper\">\n                  <div class=\"a-section a-spacing-base a-padding-base a-text-left a-popover-inner\">\n                      <h3 class=\"a-color-error\">\n                          Sorry, there was a problem.\n                      </h3>\n                      <span>\n                          List unavailable.\n                      </span>\n                  </div>\n              </div>\n          </div>\n      </div>\n      <script type=\"a-state\" data-a-state=\"{&quot;key&quot;:&quot;atwl&quot;}\">{\"wishlistButtonId\":\"add-to-wishlist-button\",\"dropDownHtml\":\"\",\"wishlistButtonSubmitId\":\"add-to-wishlist-button-submit\",\"maxAjaxFailureCount\":\"3\",\"asin\":\"B00H87C3F8\"}</script>\n      \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<script type=\"a-state\" data-a-state=\"{&quot;key&quot;:&quot;jumpstart-success-modal-state&quot;}\">{\"showDPHeadJavaScript\":false,\"addSuccessModalHeader\":\"Added to your Baby Registry\"}</script>\n\n<input type=\"hidden\" name=\"\" id=\"is-fully-selected-baby-reg\">\n\n\n\n\n  </div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<script type=\"a-state\" data-a-state=\"{&quot;key&quot;:&quot;popoverState&quot;}\">{\"formId\":\"ebooksWishlist\",\"showWishListDropDown\":false,\"babyRegistryId\":\"add-to-registry-baby-button\",\"showBabyRegDropdown\":false,\"wishlistPopoverWidth\":\"206\",\"isAddToWishListDropDownAuiEnabled\":true,\"showPopover\":false,\"isBabyRegistryBrowseScriptDeprecated\":true}</script>\n\n \n\n        </form>\n    </div>\n\n\n\n\n\t                \n                \n            \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    \n    \n    \n\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n    \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    <div id=\"redeemCode_feature_div\" class=\"feature\" data-feature-name=\"redeemCode\">\n\n\n\n\n    \n\n    \n    \n    \n        \n            \n                \n\t                \n\t                \n\t                \t\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n    \n        \n\n\n\n\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n    P.when('A', 'jQuery').execute(function (A, $) {\n\n        /*\n        redemptionResultStatusToMessageBody : Messages handling the different results from the redeem code end point\n        redemptionResultStatusToMessageType : Message type pointing to the type of the alert that is to be shown to the user\n        */\n\n        \n            \n                var redemptionResultStatusToMessageBody = {\"promo\":{\"expired\":\"The promotion code you entered is not valid or has expired. Please check the promotion code and try again. \",\"applied\":\"This promotion has been applied to your account.\",\"applied-eligible\":\"The promotion %promo has been applied to your account.<br/><br/>This promotion will be automatically applied to your order when you purchase this item.\",\"applied-not-eligible\":\"The promotion %promo has been applied to your account, however the Kindle edition of Rag Dolls: Callie's Story is not eligible for this promotion.<br/><br/>This promotion will be saved to your account and automatically applied to your order when you purchase a qualifying item.\",\"failure\":\"There was an unexpected issue while processing your code. Please try again.\",\"not-logged-in\":\"Please sign in to enter a promotion code or gift card.\",\"already-applied\":\"The promotion code you entered has previously been redeemed.\",\"invalid\":\"The code you entered is invalid.\",\"invalid-or-redeemed\":\"The promotion code you entered is not valid or has previously been used.\"},\"gc\":{\"already-applied-no-bal\":\"The gift card you entered has already been applied to your account.\",\"already-claimed\":\"The gift card you entered has already been redeemed.\",\"expired\":\"The gift card you entered is expired.\",\"applied\":\"Your gift card has been redeemed and your new gift card balance is %gcBal. This balance will be applied to your future orders. \",\"applied-no-bal\":\"Your gift card has been redeemed.\",\"failure\":\"There was an unexpected issue while processing your code. Please try again.\",\"not-logged-in\":\"Please sign in to enter a promotion code or gift card.\",\"already-applied\":\"The gift card you entered has already been applied to your account. Your current balance is %gcBal.\",\"invalid\":\"The code you entered is invalid.\"}};\n            \n            \n        \n\n        var redemptionResultStatusToMessageType = {\n                'applied'                : 'success',\n                'applied-no-bal'         : 'success',\n                'applied-eligible'       : 'success',\n                'applied-not-eligible'   : 'info',\n                'already-applied'        : 'info',\n                'already-applied-no-bal' : 'info',\n                'already-claimed'        : 'info',\n                'invalid'                : 'info',\n                'invalid-or-redeemed'    : 'info',\n                'expired'                : 'info',\n                'not-logged-in'          : 'info',\n                'failure'                : 'error',\n            };\n\n        /*\n        clickPromoLink\n\n        This function consists of an ajax call that logs the promo link being\n        clicked and a function call that determines and renders any eligible promotions.\n        */\n        var clickPromoLink = function(shouldShowPopover) {\n            A.ajax(\"/gp/digital/fiona/detail/digital-promo/ajax/log-link-click\",{\n                method:\"post\",\n                params: {sid: $(\"#sid\").val()}\n            });\n\n            // Clear any previously rendered success or info messages and code input\n            $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message').hide();\n            $(\"#kindle_redeem_promo_input\").val(\"\");\n\n            checkForPromosAndRender(shouldShowPopover);\n        };\n\n        /*\n        ELIGIBLE PROMOTION CHECKS\n\n        checkForPromosAndRender\n        This is a series of 2 nested ajax calls. The first does a relatively quick lookup to\n        see if there are any eligible promotions for this ASIN or for this customer. If there are, we'll\n        make the subsequent call to see what promotions will be applied if the customer makes a purchase.\n        */\n        var checkForPromosAndRender = function(shouldShowPopover) {\n\n            var $promoDetailsHolder  = $('#kindle_promo_details_holder'),\n                inputData = $(\"#redeemCodeForm\").serializeArray();\n\n            //Check to see if we've already made this call, and don't do it again.\n            if ($promoDetailsHolder.data('has_data')) { return; }\n\n            A.ajax(\"/gp/digital/fiona/detail/digital-promo/ajax/check-promos\",{\n                method : 'post',\n                params : inputData,\n                success : function(hasPromoData, textStatus, jqXHR) {\n                    $promoDetailsHolder.data('has_data', true);\n                    if (hasPromoData['asin_has_promo'] === 'true' || hasPromoData['customer_has_promo'] === 'true') {\n                        renderPromoDetails(shouldShowPopover);\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        };\n\n        /*\n        renderPromoDetails\n\n        This is a function for checking which promotions will be applied to a purchase\n        and render those details in the popover.\n        */\n        var renderPromoDetails = function(shouldShowPopover) {\n\n            var $promoDetailsHolder  = $('#kindle_promo_details_holder'),\n                inputData = $(\"#redeemCodeForm\").serializeArray();\n\n            A.ajax(\"/gp/digital/fiona/detail/digital-promo/ajax/promo-details\",{\n                method : 'post',\n                params : inputData,\n                success : function(promoData, textStatus, jqXHR) {\n                    if (promoData && promoData.promotions && promoData.promotions.length) {\n                        showPromosInPopover(promoData.promotions);\n                        showPromosInPriceBlock(promoData.promotions, shouldShowPopover);\n                    } else {\n                        $('#kindle_promo_details_holder').hide();\n                    }\n                }\n            });\n        };\n\n        /*\n        CLAIM CODE REDEMPTION\n\n        Promotion/GC redemption click handler. This will perform an ajax call to redeem a promotion or\n        gift card and display an informative message upon return.\n        */\n\n        A.declarative('redeemPromoCode', 'click', function(event) {\n\n            //Disable the apply button\n            $('#kindle_redeem_promo_button').attr('disabled','disabled');\n\n            var inputData = $(\"#redeemCodeForm\").serializeArray(),\n                $claimCodeNode = $(\"#kindle_redeem_promo_input\"),\n                claimCode = $claimCodeNode.val(),\n                $redeemPromoMsg = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message'),\n                $loadingIndicator = $('#kindle_promo_loading_image_block');\n\n            //pushing the claim code into the parameter list passed to the ajax call\n            inputData.push({name: 'code',value:claimCode});\n\n            //show loading indicator and clear the existing redeemPromoMsg block\n            $loadingIndicator.show();\n            $redeemPromoMsg.hide();\n\n            A.ajax(\"/gp/digital/fiona/detail/digital-promo/ajax/redeem\",{\n                method: \"post\",\n                params: inputData,\n                success: function(redeemPromoResult, textStatus, jqXHR) {\n                    var status                = redeemPromoResult['resultStatus'];\n                    var gcBalance             = redeemPromoResult['gcBalance'];\n                    var isEligible            = redeemPromoResult['isEligible'];\n                    var allEligiblePromotions = redeemPromoResult['allEligiblePromotions'];\n                    var promoDescription      = redeemPromoResult['promoDescription'];\n                    var promoID               = redeemPromoResult['redeemedPromoID'];\n                    var claimCodeType         = redeemPromoResult['claimCodeType'];\n                    var wasCodeApplied        = status === 'applied';\n                    var shouldLinkPromo       = true;\n\n                    //Update the status to be a special variant of 'applied' in two cases\n\n                    /*\n                    1. The code was a promotion, it was successfully applied to the account, and\n                         we asked for eligibility.\n                    */\n                    if (claimCodeType === 'promo' && isEligible === 'false') {\n                        status += '-not-eligible';\n                        shouldLinkPromo = false;\n                    }\n\n                    /*\n                    2. The code was a gift card, it was successfully applied to the account, and\n                        we don't have an updated GC balance to add to the message.\n                    */\n                    if (claimCodeType === 'gc' && wasCodeApplied && !gcBalance) {\n                         status += '-no-bal';\n                    }\n\n                    var messageType = redemptionResultStatusToMessageType[status];\n                    var messageBody = \"\";\n                    if (redemptionResultStatusToMessageBody && redemptionResultStatusToMessageBody[claimCodeType]) {\n                        messageBody = redemptionResultStatusToMessageBody[claimCodeType][status];\n                    }\n\n                    // Render the message for the customer\n                    if (messageType && messageBody) {\n                        // Replace String variables with data that came back from the remote call.\n                        var promoName = shouldLinkPromo ? getPromoLink(promoID, promoDescription) : promoDescription;\n                        if (!promoName) {\n                            promoName = \"Special Offer\"\n                        }\n                        messageBody = messageBody.replace(\"%promo\",promoName);\n\n                        if(promoID) {\n                            /*\n                            The string should include the closing </a> tag so that the words that are linked can\n                            be determined on a language-by-language basis. So we just pass in the beginning of the\n                            <a href=\"...\"> tag with the variable info.\n                            */\n                            messageBody = messageBody.replace('%url', '<a href=\"/gp/promotion/' + escapeHtml(promoID) + '\">');\n                        }\n\n                        if(gcBalance) {\n                            messageBody = messageBody.replace('%gcBal', gcBalance);\n                        }\n\n                        showMessage($redeemPromoMsg, messageType, messageBody);\n\n                        if(claimCodeType === 'promo' && isEligible === 'true') {\n                            showPromosInPopover(allEligiblePromotions);\n                            showPromosInPriceBlock(allEligiblePromotions, shouldShowPopover);\n                        }\n\n                        if(wasCodeApplied) {\n                            $claimCodeNode.val('');\n                        }\n                    } else {\n                        // When a success code is returned but the status/claimCode is unknown\n                        showMessage($redeemPromoMsg, 'info', \"The code you entered is invalid.\" );\n                    }\n                },\n                error: function(redeemPromoResult, textStatus, jqXHR) {\n                    showMessage($redeemPromoMsg, 'error', \"There was an unexpected issue while processing your code. Please try again.\" );\n                }\n            });\n            $loadingIndicator.hide();\n            $('#kindle_redeem_promo_button').removeAttr('disabled');\n        });\n\n        /*\n        UTILITY FUNCTIONS\n\n        showPromosInPopover\n        Render a list if promotions that will be applied to this purchase in the popover\n        below the input box for redeeming a claim code.\n        */\n        var showPromosInPopover = function(promotions) {\n            if (promotions) {\n                var promoDetailsHolder   = $('#kindle_promo_details_holder');\n                var promoDetailsTemplate = promoDetailsHolder.find('.kindle_promo_details_text.template');\n\n                //Getting all the promotions\n                var promoLinks = getPromoLinks(promotions);\n\n                //Remove any existing text in the promo details section\n                promoDetailsHolder.find('.kindle_promo_details_text').each(function() {\n                    var $oldDetails = $(this);\n                    if (!$oldDetails.hasClass('template')) {\n                        $oldDetails.remove();\n                    }\n                });\n\n                //Clone the template for displaying an applicable promotion for each promo we found\n                if (promoLinks.length) {\n                    var promoDetails = promoDetailsTemplate.clone().removeClass('template');\n                    var linkDiv = promoDetails.find('.kindle_promo_details_promo_name').clone();\n                    promoDetails.appendTo(promoDetailsHolder);\n                    promoDetails.show();\n                    for (var i = 0; i < promoLinks.length; i++) {\n                        var tmplinkDiv = linkDiv.clone().html(promoLinks[i]);\n                        tmplinkDiv.appendTo(promoDetails);\n                    }\n\n                    /* The trial calculation will sometimes return multiple promotions that are eligible, though\n                    only a subset will be applied on pruchase. We need to show some legal fine print whenever\n                    there are multiple promotions to show here.\n                    */\n\n                    var $footer = $('#kindle_promo_multiple_promo_footer');\n                    if (promoLinks.length > 1) {\n                        $footer.show();\n                    } else {\n                        $footer.hide();\n                    }\n\n                    promoDetailsHolder.slideDown();\n                }\n            }\n        };\n\n        /*\n        showPromosInPriceBlock\n\n        Render a list of eligible promotions in the price block. There's a jQuery event\n        registered in the price block code to take promotion text and display it. This\n        function constructs the text and triggers that event.\n        */\n        var showPromosInPriceBlock = function(promotions, shouldShowPopover) {\n            if(!promotions || !shouldShowPopover) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var promotionLinks = getPromoLinks(promotions);\n            var promotionText = \"\";\n            if(promotionLinks.length) {\n                for (var i = 0; i < promotionLinks.length; i++) {\n                    promotionText += promotionLinks[i] + \"<br>\";\n                }\n            }\n\n            A.trigger('kindle_price_block_show_promotions',promotionText,promotionLinks.length);\n        }\n\n        /*\n          The trial calculation will sometimes return multiple promotions that are eligible, though\n          only a subset will be applied on pruchase. We need to show some legal fine print whenever\n          there are multiple promotions to show here.\n        */\n        var getPromoLinks = function(promotions) {\n\n            if (promotions && promotions.length) {\n\n                var promoLinks = [];\n                for (var i = 0; i < promotions.length; i++) {\n                    var promo = promotions[i];\n                    var link = getPromoLink(promo['id'], promo['description']);\n                    if (link) {\n                        promoLinks.push(link);\n                    }\n                }\n            return promoLinks;\n            }\n        };\n\n        /*\n          getPromoLink - Given a promotion id and description , return a link to the promotion landing page\n        */\n        var getPromoLink = function(promoID, promoDescription) {\n\n            if(!promoID) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            if(!promoDescription) {\n               promoDescription = \"Special Offer\";\n            }\n\n            return '<a href=\"/gp/promotion/' + escapeHtml(promoID) + '\">' + escapeHtml(promoDescription) + '</a>';\n        };\n\n        var escapeHtmlMap = {\n           \"&\": \"&amp;\",\n           \"<\": \"&lt;\",\n           \">\": \"&gt;\",\n           '\"': '&quot;',\n           \"'\": '&#39;',\n           \"/\": '&#x2F;'\n        };\n\n        // Used for escaping text returned from ajax calls to avoid XSS attacks.\n        var escapeHtml = function(string) {\n            return String(string).replace(/[&<>\"'\\/]/g, function (s) {\n                return escapeHtmlMap[s];\n            });\n        };\n\n        /*\n        showMessage\n\n        Utility function for displaying a standard Amazon success/info/warn/error message.\n        */\n        var showMessage = function(container, type, body) {\n            var $successAlert = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_success'),\n                $successAlertContent = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_success .a-alert-content'),\n                $errorAlert = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_error'),\n                $errorAlertContent = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_error .a-alert-content'),\n                $infoAlert = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_info'),\n                $infoAlertContent = $('#kindle_redeem_promo_message_content_info .a-alert-content');\n\n            $successAlert.hide();\n            $errorAlert.hide();\n            $infoAlert.hide();\n\n            if(type === \"success\") {\n                $successAlertContent.html(body)\n                $successAlert.show();\n            } else if(type === \"info\") {\n                $infoAlertContent.html(body);\n                $infoAlert.show();\n            } else if(type === \"error\") {\n                $errorAlertContent.html(body);\n                $errorAlert.show();\n            }\n            container.show();\n        };\n\n        // Find if there are any promo links attached to the given asin when the promo link is clicked\n        P.when('A').execute(function(A){\n            A.on(\"a:popover:show:redeem-promo\", function(data){\n                var shouldShowPopover = false;\n                \n                    shouldShowPopover = true;\n                \n\n                var popover = data.popover;\n                clickPromoLink(shouldShowPopover);\n\n                if ($(\"#narration-checkbox\").is(':checked')) {\n                    $('#narration-disclaimer').show();\n                } else {\n                    $('#narration-disclaimer').hide();\n                }\n            });\n         });\n    });\n</script>\n    \n\n    <div id=\"redeemCode\" class=\"a-section a-spacing-small a-text-center\">\n        \n        \n\n        \n\n        \n\n        \n        \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n        \n\n\n        \n        \n            \n            \n                \n                \n                    \n                        \n\t                    \n\t                        <p class=\"a-text-center a-size-small\">\n\t                            <a class=\"a-link-normal\" href=\"/gp/sign-in.html?useRedirectOnSuccess=1&amp;path=/gp/product/B00H87C3F8&amp;redirectProtocol=current\">\n\t                                Enter a promotion code or Gift Card\n\t                            </a>\n\t                        </p>\n\t                    \n                    \n                \n            \n        \n    </div>\n\n\n\t                \n                \n            \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    \n    \n    \n\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n    \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    <div id=\"tellAFriendBylineBox_feature_div\" class=\"feature\" data-feature-name=\"tellAFriendBylineBox\">\n\n\n\n\n    \n\n    \n    \n    \n        \n            \n                \n\t                \n\t                \n\t                \t\n\n\n\n\n\n    \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n        <div id=\"tell-a-friend-byline\" data-close=\"Close\" class=\"a-declarative\" data-action=\"a-modal\" data-a-modal=\"{&quot;cache&quot;:&quot;false&quot;,&quot;width&quot;:&quot;480&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;swf&quot;,&quot;header&quot;:&quot;Share class=\"a-icon a-icon-share-email\"></i></a><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span>\n                    </span>\n                \n            \n\n            \n                \n                \n                    \n                    \n                    <a data-height=\"400\" class=\"a-link-normal swf-social-site\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" title=\"Share on Facebook\" href=\"/gp/redirect.html/ref=cm_sw_cl_fa_dp_t2_O2U-ybM5YS330?_encoding=UTF8&amp;location=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fdialog%2Fshare%3F_encoding%3DUTF8%26display%3Dpopup%26href%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.amazon.com%252Fdp%252FB00H87C3F8%252Fref%253Dcm_sw_r_fa_dp_t2_O2U-ybM5YS330%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.amazon.com%252Fgp%252Fpdp%252Ftaf%252Ffb_post_redirect.html%252Fref%253Dcm_sw_s_fa_dp_t2_O2U-ybM5YS330%26app_id%3D164734381262%26hashtag%3D%2523Amazon&amp;token=E0915379AEBDF40D2C90D4882003C7011F43D80C\"><i class=\"a-icon a-icon-share-facebook\" aria-label=\"Facebook\"><span class=\"a-icon-alt\">Facebook</span></i></a><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span>\n                \n            \n 895px;\n}\n\n</script>\n\n\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\nP.register(\"DynamicIframe\", function(){\n\nfunction DynamicIframe(options) {\n  \n  var nTries = 0,\n      MAX_TRIES = 20,\n      iframeId = options.iframeId,\n      encodedIframeContent = options.encodedIframeContent,\n      iframeWrapperId = options.iframeWrapperId,\n      initialResizeCallback = options.initialResizeCallback,\n      iframeCSSId = \"dynamic_iframe_CSS\";\n      iframeOverriddenCSSId = options.overriddenCSSId;\n    \n  this.createIframe = function() {\n    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');\n    iframe.id = iframeId;\n    iframe.className = \"ap_never_hide\";\n    iframe.width = \"100%\";\n    iframe.scrolling = \"no\";\n    iframe.frameBorder = \"0\";\n    onloadFn = this.iframeload;\n    \n    if ( iframe.addEventListener )\n      iframe.addEventListener(\"load\", onloadFn, false);\n    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )\n      iframe.attachEvent(\"onload\", onloadFn);\n    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;\n    \n    var wrapper = document.getElementById(iframeWrapperId);\n    wrapper.innerHTML = '';\n    iframe = wrapper.appendChild(iframe);\n    \n    var overriddenCSS = \"\";\n    if (document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId)) {\n    \toverriddenCSS = document.getElementById(iframeOverriddenCSSId).innerHTML;\n    }\n    \n    var doc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);\n    if (doc && doc.open) {\n      doc.open();\n\n      doc.writeln('<html><head><base target=\"_top\" /></' + 'head><body><style class=\"text/css\">' + document.getElementById(iframeCSSId).innerHTML + overriddenCSS + '</style><div id=\"iframeContent\">' + \n              '' + decodeURIComponent(encodedIframeContent) + '</'+'div>'+'</'+'body></html>');\n      doc.close();\n    }\n  }\n  \n  this.iframeload = function () {\n    var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);\n    iframe.style.display = '';\n    setTimeout(function () {\n      setIframeHeight(initialResizeCallback);\n    }, 20); \n  }\n  \n  function getDocHeight(doc) {\n    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById(\"iframeContent\");\n    var docHeight = 0;\n    if(contentDiv){\n      docHeight = Math.max(\n        contentDiv.scrollHeight,\n        contentDiv.offsetHeight,\n        contentDiv.clientHeight\n      );\n    }\n    return docHeight;\n  }\n  \n  function setIframeHeight(resizeCallback) {\n    var iframeDoc, iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);\n    iframeDoc = ((iframe.contentWindow && iframe.contentWindow.document) || iframe.contentDocument);\n    if (iframeDoc) {\n      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);\n      if (h && h != 0) {\n        iframe.style.height = parseInt(h) + 'px';\n        if(typeof resizeCallback == \"function\") {\n          resizeCallback(iframeId);\t\n        }\n      } else if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {\n        nTries++;\n        setTimeout(function () {\n            setIframeHeight(resizeCallback);\n        }, 50);\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  \n  this.resizeIframe = function(resizeCallback) {\n    nTries = 0;\n\tsetIframeHeight(resizeCallback);\n  }\n}\n\nreturn DynamicIframe;\n});\n</script>\n\n\t                \n                \n            \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    \n    \n    \n\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n    \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    <div id=\"kindleIllustratedBanner_feature_div\" class=\"feature\" data-feature-name=\"kindleIllustratedBanner\">\n\n\n\n\n    \n\n    \n    \n    \n        \n            \n                \n\t                \n\t                \n\t                \t\n\n\n\n\t                \n                \n            \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n        \n    \n    \n    \n\n    \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n    \n        \n        \n\n        \n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    <div id=\"bookDescription_feature_div\" class=\"feature\" data-feature-name=\"bookDescription\">\n\n\n\n\n    \n\n    \n    \n    \n        \n            \n                \n\t                \n\t                \n\t                \t\n\n\n\n<script id=\"bookDesc_override_CSS\" type=\"text/undefined\">\nbody { \n    font-size: 14px;\n    line-height: 1.6em;\n}\n\n.aplus {\n\tmin-width: inherit;\n}\n</script>\n\n\n    \n    \n        \n    \n\n\n\n <noscript>\n \t&lt;div&gt; After the sudden death of her beloved Nana, Callie is ripped away from everything she knows and placed in a filthy, loveless home which is overcrowded with foster children. Because of her ability to feel other's emotions, she is overwhelmed by pain from the other children. Callie knows that if she is to survive, she will have to turn off her emotions completely, but this makes people around her uncomfortable. She is moved from home to home, but she fits in nowhere. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Finally she&amp;#x2019;s moved to a home where she hopes she'll be able to stay, but something terrible happens. Now, she has a secret which she knows could get her killed. She knows that if she wants to live she'll have to leave, but she has no money, no family and nowhere to go. She tries to escape but he&amp;#x2019;s following her and he&amp;#x2019;s getting closer. &lt;br /&gt;&lt;br /&gt;Will Callie escape with her life?&lt;/div&gt;\n \t&lt;em&gt;&lt;/em&gt;\n </noscript>\n  <div id=\"outer_postBodyPS\" style=\"overflow: hidden; z-index: 1; height: 112px; display: block;\">\n\t<div id=\"postBodyPS\" style=\"overflow: hidden;\">\n      <div id=\"bookDesc_iframe_wrapper\" class=\"maxReadableWidth\"><iframe id=\"bookDesc_iframe\" class=\"ap_never_hide\" width=\"100%\" scrolling=\"no\" frameborder=\"0\" style=\"height: 374px;\"></iframe></div>\n      \n    </div>\n  </div>\n  <div id=\"psPlaceHolder\" style=\"height: 20px; display: block;\">\n  \t<div style=\"z-index: 3;\">\n\t\t\n   \t\t  \n   \t\t<a class=\"a-link-expander h2-expander\">\n\t   \t\t<i id=\"bdExpanderIcon\" class=\"a-icon a-icon-expand\"></i>\n\t   \t\t<span id=\"bdSeeAllPrompt\" style=\"display: block;\">Read more</span>\n\t   \t\t<span id=\"bdSeeLessPrompt\" style=\"display: none;\">Read less</span>\n   \t\t</a>\n  \t</div>\n </div>\n\n<script type=\"text/javascript\">\n \nP.when('DynamicIframe').execute(function(DynamicIframe){\n\tvar BookDescriptionIframe = null,\n\t    bookDescEncodedData = \"After%20the%20sudden%20death%20of%20her%20beloved%20Nana%2C%20Callie%20is%20ripped%20away%20from%20everything%20she%20knows%20and%20placed%20in%20a%20filthy%2C%20loveless%20home%20which%20is%20overcrowded%20with%20foster%20children.%20Because%20of%20her%20ability%20to%20feel%20other%27s%20emotions%2C%20she%20is%20overwhelmed%20by%20pain%20from%20the%20other%20children.%20Callie%20knows%20that%20if%20she%20is%20to%20survive%2C%20she%20will%20have%20to%20turn%20off%20her%20emotions%20completely%2C%20but%20this%20makes%20people%20around%20her%20uncomfortable.%20She%20is%20moved%20from%20home%20to%20home%2C%20but%20she%20fits%20in%20nowhere.%20%3Cbr%20%2F%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3EFinally%20she%26%23x2019%3Bs%20moved%20to%20a%20home%20where%20she%20hopes%20she%27ll%20be%20able%20to%20stay%2C%20but%20something%20terrible%20happens.%20Now%2C%20she%20has%20a%20secret%20which%20she%20knows%20could%20get%20her%20killed.%20She%20knows%20that%20if%20she%20wants%20to%20live%20she%27ll%20have%20to%20leave%2C%20but%20she%20has%20no%20money%2C%20no%20family%20and%20nowhere%20to%20go.%20She%20tries%20to%20escape%20but%20he%26%23x2019%3Bs%20following%20her%20and%20he%26%23x2019%3Bs%20getting%20closer.%20%3Cbr%20%2F%3E%3Cbr%20%2F%3EWill%20Callie%20escape%20with%20her%20life%3F\",\n\t    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight,\n\t    minBookDescriptionInitialHeight = 112,\n\t    options = {},\n\t    iframeId = \"bookDesc_iframe\";\n \n    function resizeCallback() {\n        P.guardFatal(\"bookDescription\", function() {\n            // Get the line-height of the iframe\n            var iframe = document.getElementById(iframeId);\n            var iframeDocument = iframe.contentDocument;\n\n            if (true && iframeDocument && iframeDocument.defaultView) {\n                // Set the height to the number of lines specified\n                var numLines = parseInt(5, 10);\n \n                // Get the line-height of the iframe\n                var iframeContent = iframeDocument.getElementById(\"iframeContent\");\n \n                // Compute the line height\n                var lineHeight = iframeDocument.defaultView.getComputedStyle(iframeContent, null).getPropertyValue(\"line-height\");\n\n                // Parse the line height\n                lineHeight = parseFloat(lineHeight);\n                bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = Math.round(lineHeight * numLines);\n            } else {\n                var bdOffsetTop = document.getElementById(\"bookDescription_feature_div\").offsetTop;\n                var imageBlockOffsetTop = document.getElementById(\"booksImageBlock_feature_div\").offsetTop;\n                var imageBlockHeight = document.getElementById(\"booksImageBlock_feature_div\").offsetHeight;\n                bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = imageBlockOffsetTop + imageBlockHeight -bdOffsetTop - 30;\n                if(bookDescriptionAvailableHeight < minBookDescriptionInitialHeight) {\n                    bookDescriptionAvailableHeight = minBookDescriptionInitialHeight;\n                }\n            }\n    \t\t\n            var psTotalHeight = document.getElementById(\"postBodyPS\").offsetHeight;\n \n            if(psTotalHeight > bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 30){\n                if(document.getElementById(\"bdSeeLessPrompt\").style.display == \"none\"){\n                    document.getElementById(\"outer_postBodyPS\").style.height = bookDescriptionAvailableHeight + 'px';\n                    document.getElementById(\"psPlaceHolder\").style.display =\"block\";\n                    document.getElementById(\"bdSeeAllPrompt\").style.display =\"block\";\n                }\n                else{\n                    document.getElementById(\"outer_postBodyPS\").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';\n                }\n            }\n            else{\n                document.getElementById(\"outer_postBodyPS\").style.height = psTotalHeight + 'px';\n                document.getElementById(\"psPlaceHolder\").style.display =\"none\";\n                document.getElementById(\"bdSeeAllPrompt\").style.display =\"block\";\n                document.getElementById(\"bdSeeLessPrompt\").style.display =\"none\";\n                document.getElementById(\"bdExpanderIcon\").className = document.getElementById(\"bdExpanderIcon\").className.replace(\"rotate\",\"\");\n            }\n        })();\n    }\n\n    options.iframeId = iframeId;\n    options.iframeWrapperId = \"bookDesc_iframe_wrapper\";\n\toptions.overriddenCSSId = \"bookDesc_override_CSS\";\n\toptions.encodedIframeContent = bookDescEncodedData;\n\toptions.initialResizeCallback = resizeCallback;\n\t\n\tBookDescriptionIframe = new DynamicIframe(options);\n\tP.guardFatal(\"bookDescription\", function() {\n\t    BookDescriptionIframe.createIframe();\n\t}) ();\n\t    \n\tif ((typeof BookDescriptionIframe != 'undefined') && (BookDescriptionIframe instanceof DynamicIframe)) {\n\t jQuery) {\n    var kcpAppBaseObj_ = jQuery('.kcpAppBaseBox_');\n    var kcpAppDialogObj_ = jQuery('.kcpAppsPopOverDialog_');\n    var escChar = String.fromCharCode(0x5c);\n    function isValidEmail(emailAddress) {\n        //If email not supported or invalid email address return false\n        if ( parseInt(\"\") || (emailAddress && typeof emailAddress !== \"string\" )) {\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        // validating only from @ to end\n        var validator = new RegExp(escChar + \"w+@[\" + escChar +\"w\" + escChar + \"-+_]+?\" + escChar + \".[\" + escChar + \"w\" + escChar + \"-+_]+\");\n        return emailAddress.match( validator ) != null;\n    }\n    \n    function isValidPhone(phoneNumber) {\n        //If sms not supported or no input return false\n        if ( parseInt(\"\") || !phoneNumber ) {\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        var validator = new RegExp(\"^([0-9\" + escChar + \"(\" + escChar + \")\" + escChar + \"/\" + escChar + \"+\" + escChar + \"-]*)$\");\n        var digitsOnly = phoneNumber.replace(/D/g, '');\n        return digitsOnly.length >= 9 && digitsOnly.length < 20 && phoneNumber.match(validator) != null; \n    }\n    \n    function appendCountryCode(phoneNumber) {\n        var countryCode = \"\";\n        if ( countryCode && isValidPhone(phoneNumber) && !phoneNumber.match(/^\\+/g) ) {\n            phoneNumber = countryCode + phoneNumber;\n        }\n        return phoneNumber;\n    }\n    \n    var successMessage = \"The app is on the way!\";\n    var processError = \"Unable to process your request right now. //Unbind previous clicks to avoid duplicate bindings.\n        kcpAppDialogObj_.find(\".kcpAppSendButton\").bind(\"click\", function(){\n           var recipient = kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppRecipient').val();\n           var inputData = {\n            \"recipient\" : appendCountryCode(recipient),\n            \"downloadLink\" : (emailSmartLink_) ? emailSmartLink_ : \"https://www.amazon.com/gp/kindle/kcpApp.html\",\n            \"toJSON\" : \"1\"\n           };\n           if(isValidEmail(recipient)){\n               inputData['communicationType'] = 'email';\n               submitRTERequest(inputData);\n           } else if(isValidPhone(recipient)){\n               inputData['communicationType'] = 'sms';\n               submitRTERequest(inputData);\n               if(smsSmartLink_){\n                 inputData[downloadLink] = smsSmartLink_;\n               }\n           } else {\n               kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliverySuccess, .kcpAppDeliveryError').html(\"\");\n               kcpAppDialogObj_.find('.kcpAppDeliveryError').html(\"Invalid information. ProductDescriptionIframeResize = {};\n(function () {\n  var d = document;\n  var obj = this;\n  var nTries = 1;\n  var hasCustomWidth = 0;\n  var MAX_TRIES = 20;\n  obj.iframeId = 'product-description-iframe';\n  obj.appendTo = 'iframe-wrapper';\n  function getDocHeight (doc) {\n    var contentDiv = doc.getElementById(\"pdIframeContent\");\n    var docHeight = 0;\n    if(contentDiv){\n      docHeight = Math.max(\n        contentDiv.scrollHeight,\n        contentDiv.offsetHeight,\n        contentDiv.clientHeight\n      );\n    }\n    return docHeight;\n  }  \n  function isElementOnRight(pdRef, el) {\n    var ret=0;\n    try {\n      if(pdRef, el) {\n        if((el.offsetTop < pdRef.offsetTop) && (el.offsetTop + el.offsetHeight > pdRef.offsetTop)) {\n          ret = 1;\n        }\n      }\n    } catch (e) {}\n    return ret;\n  }\n  function setWidth(iframeRef, el) {\n    var elLeft, w, minW = 450;\n    try {\n      elLeft = el.offsetLeft;\n      w = elLeft - 50;\n      if(w > minW) {\n        iframeRef.style.width = w + 'px';\n        hasCustomWidth = 1;\n      }\n    } catch (e) {}\n  }\n  function setIframeWidth(ifrmId) {\n    var iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId),\n        pdRef = d.getElementById(\"pd-available\"),\n        rightCol = d.getElementById(\"rightCol\"),\n        rightRail = d.getElementById(\"rightRail\");\n    if(isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightRail)) {\n      setWidth(iframeRef, rightRail); \n    } else if (isElementOnRight(pdRef, rightCol)) {\n      setWidth(iframeRef, rightCol);\n    }\n  }\n  function setIframeHeight (ifrmId) {\n    var iframeDoc, iframeRef = d.getElementById(ifrmId);\n    try {\n      iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentWindow.document;\n    } catch (e) {\n      try {\n        iframeDoc = iframeRef.contentDocument;\n      } catch (ex) {}\n    }\n    if (iframeDoc) {\n      var h = getDocHeight(iframeDoc);\n      if (h && h != 0) {\n        iframeRef.style.height = h + 'px';\n      } else { \n        if (nTries < MAX_TRIES) {\n          nTries++;\n          setTimeout(function () {\n            setIframeHeight(ifrmId);\n          }, 50); \n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n  obj.iframeload = function () {\n    var iframe = d.getElementById(obj.iframeId);\n    iframe.style.display = '';\n    iframe.style.height = \"1px\";\n    setTimeout(function () {\n      if(obj.needWidthAdjust) {\n        setIframeWidth(obj.iframeId);\n      }\n      setIframeHeight(obj.iframeId);\n      var onloadCallback = obj.onloadCallback;\n      if(typeof onloadCallback === \"function\") {\n        onloadCallback();\n      }\n    }, 50); \n\n  }\n  obj.createIframe = function ( iframeId, onloadFn ) {\n    var iframe = d.createElement('iframe');\n    iframe.id = iframeId;\n    iframe.className = \"ap_never_hide\";\n    iframe.width = \"100%\";\n    iframe.scrolling=\"no\";\n    iframe.frameBorder=\"0\";\n    if ( iframe.addEventListener )\n      iframe.addEventListener(\"load\", onloadFn, false);\n    else if ( iframe.attachEvent )\n      iframe.attachEvent(\"onload\", onloadFn);\n    else iframe.onload = onloadFn;\n    return iframe; \n  }\n  obj.initialize = function (onloadCallback, needWidthAdjust) {\n    var iframeContent =    obj.onloadCallback = onloadCallback;\n    obj.needWidthAdjust = needWidthAdjust;\n    var iframe = obj.createIframe (obj.iframeId, obj.iframeload);\n    var wrapper = The people were very real.  The transitions from Callie's now and her memories were well coordinated.  It wasn't done abruptly so that you couldn't remember what the story was doing last. abuse</a></span></span></div></div></div><div id=\"RA35SCSKR4NPO\" data-hook=\"review\" class=\"a-section review\"><div id=\"customer_review-RA35SCSKR4NPO\" class=\"a-section celwidget\"><div class=\"a-row\"><a class=\"a-link-normal\" title=\"5.0 out of 5 stars\" href=\"/gp/customer-reviews/RA35SCSKR4NPO/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00H87C3F8\"><i data-hook=\"review-star-rating\" class=\"a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating\"><span class=\"a-icon-alt\">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-title\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold\" href=\"/gp/customer-reviews/RA35SCSKR4NPO/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00H87C3F8\">To every cloud, a silver lining - LOVED this excellently written story!</a></div><div class=\"a-row\"><span data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-byline\"><span class=\"a-color-secondary\">By</span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal author\" href=\"/gp/pdp/profile/A1C396TZPJL60S/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_pdp?ie=UTF8\">Appleheartebc</a></span><span class=\"a-declarative\" data-action=\"cr-popup\" data-cr-popup=\"{&quot;width&quot;:&quot;340&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Help&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;340&quot;}\"></span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><span data-hook=\"review-date\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date\">on November 23, 2014</span></div><div class=\"a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip\"><span data-hook=\"format-strip-linkless\" class=\"a-color-secondary\">Format: Kindle Edition</span></div><div class=\"a-row review-data\"><span data-hook=\"review-body\" class=\"a-size-base review-text\"><div aria-live=\"polite\" data-a-expander-name=\"review_text_read_more\" data-a-expander-collapsed-height=\"300\" class=\"a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container\" style=\"max-height: none; height: 300px;\"><div data-hook=\"review-collapsed\" aria-expanded=\"false\" class=\"a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content\" style=\"padding-bottom: 19px;\">**I received a copy of this book in exchange for an honest review.**<br><br>This was a difficult read for me, not because it is not well written, or there were many grammatical errors, wrong word usage and misspellings. It was difficult because I was crying a lot while reading and just as I dislike writing reviews, I do not like to cry when I read, because reading should be relaxing, something I like to do for leisure especially coming home after a hectic 12-hour work day taking care of sick people. Perhaps it is true what they say about nurses being masochists because once I started reading, I could not put the book (e-reader) down even though I was crying so hard that the letters began to blur and I started sniffling and my throat started to hurt from the big lump that would not budge, no matter how hard I tried to clear my throat. I was crying and laughing at the same time because I was sad (crying) and I felt silly (for laughing) and I was thinking that if my friends could see me, they will all be wondering if I had lost it cuz I never cry when I am with them! That said, on to my review.<br><br>Callie was just a baby when she lost her mother. Her grandmother was given custody of her. They lived in a place like a retirement home so she had many grandmothers and was a very happy and caring/loving child. She had a BFF who is the grandson of one of the ladies in the home. One day she returned from school and found that her grandmother had suffered a heart attack and succumbed. She was fostered from one home to another, and what broke my heart was every time she is happy and settled, she gets moved to another home. I am afraid that if I continue, I might inadvertently write something that will spoil the reading for others so I will stop right here.<br><br>Suffice to say that following Callie as she goes from one foster home to another really made me feel for the children who may get 'lost' inside the system like Callie and two other kids. The thought of the many foster children, in real life, who are at the mercy of people who only want money, the thought that these people are using the money NOT for the children but for themselves and the thought that the children are mistreated, abused and are expected to not only fend for themselves and perhaps are being used for cheap labor, angers me. It also made me think and perhaps not turn/look the other way when something like this happens in my neighborhood.<br><br>Shelley Terrell, thank you for writing Callie's story - she is a strong person to withstand the ugliness and rise above it. I cried when she went through the loss of everybody who cared about her. I cheered when she decided to run away and not stay when her life was in danger. I rejoiced when she met the hermit in the woods who took care of her and saved her from the horrible legal guardian. I cried when tragedy struck again but I was happy at the ending and I loved the twist. I will be looking forward to reading the next book in this series. I hope the little girl will find her and return the rag doll. Actually, I want to also read about the other girl who became her BFF for a few months before she was moved to another foster home. I am interested to know if they will make any appearance in future Callie books.<br><br>Thank you for giving me the opportunity to read Callie's story. You will now be in my authors auto-buy list. I hope I did not post any spoilers and would like to apologize if I did. (Not good at writing reviews, as you can see.)</div><div class=\"a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header\" style=\"opacity: 1; display: block;\"><div data-hook=\"review-star-rating\" class=\"a-icon a-icon-star a-star-4 review-rating\"><span class=\"a-icon-alt\">4.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-title\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold\" href=\"/gp/customer-reviews/R3KYYM1I518N4X/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00H87C3F8\">Every emotion is touched upon - happiness, sadness</a></div><div class=\"a-row\"><span data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-byline\"><span class=\"a-color-secondary\">By</span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal author\" href=\"/gp/pdp/profile/AUK5H0095THZL/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_pdp?ie=UTF8\">Cede Cavalier</a></span><span class=\"a-declarative\" data-action=\"cr-popup\" data-cr-popup=\"{&quot;width&quot;:&quot;340&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Help&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;340&quot;}\"></span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><span data-hook=\"review-date\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date\">on November 22, 2014</span></div><div class=\"a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip\"><span data-hook=\"format-strip-linkless\" class=\"a-color-secondary\">Format: Kindle Edition</span></div><div class=\"a-row review-data\"><span data-hook=\"review-body\" class=\"a-size-base review-text\"><div aria-live=\"polite\" data-a-expander-name=\"review_text_read_more\" data-a-expander-collapsed-height=\"300\" class=\"a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container\" style=\"max-height:300px; _height:300px\"><div data-hook=\"review-collapsed\" aria-expanded=\"false\" class=\"a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content\">I received a free copy of this book in return for an honest review.<br>This story shows just how much reform is needed in today's foster care system. Callie is a young victim of the system who perseveres despite horrific experiences. Every emotion is touched upon - happiness, sadness, rage, despair and anger. Her story was interesting and compelling, although the frequent misspellings and repetitive descriptions were annoying. And, while I do enjoy books with \"happy endings\" , this one seemed just too unrealistic for my taste. I did however, enjoy the final surprise at the very end!</div><div class=\"a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header\" style=\"opacity: 0; display: none;\"><div data-cr-popup=\"{&quot;width&quot;:&quot;340&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Help&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;340&quot;}\"></span><span review-format-strip\"><span data-hook=\"format-strip-linkless\" class=\"a-color-secondary\">Format: Kindle Edition</span></div><div class=\"a-row review-data\"><span data-hook=\"review-body\" class=\"a-size-base review-text\"><div aria-live=\"polite\" data-a-expander-name=\"review_text_read_more\" data-a-expander-collapsed-height=\"300\" class=\"a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container\" style=\"max-height:300px; _height:300px\"><div data-hook=\"review-collapsed\" aria-expanded=\"false\" class=\"a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content\">This story starts out with a grabber chapter but then slows down as we learn about Callie's life in great detail. I usually prefer faster moving tales, but I must admit I stayed with it and read the entire book. It is a sweet and heart-rending story of the ills of foster care and how it can be bad, and when it tries to be good the rules sometimes interfere. Callie is an exceptional person. I wish she was real. The ending has a surprise twist.<br><br>I was given this book free in exchange for an honest review.</div><div class=\"a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header\" style=\"opacity: 0; abuse</a></span></span></div></div></div><div id=\"RYUTOP8L8UXS6\" data-hook=\"review\" class=\"a-section review\"><div id=\"customer_review-RYUTOP8L8UXS6\" class=\"a-section celwidget\"><div class=\"a-row\"><a class=\"a-link-normal\" title=\"5.0 out of 5 stars\" href=\"/gp/customer-reviews/RYUTOP8L8UXS6/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00H87C3F8\"><i data-hook=\"review-star-rating\" class=\"a-icon a-icon-star a-star-5 review-rating\"><span class=\"a-icon-alt\">5.0 out of 5 stars</span></i></a><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-title\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal review-title a-color-base a-text-bold\" href=\"/gp/customer-reviews/RYUTOP8L8UXS6/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_rvw_ttl?ie=UTF8&amp;ASIN=B00H87C3F8\">It's so good. Be sure to have your tissues near by</a></div><div class=\"a-row\"><span data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-byline\"><span class=\"a-color-secondary\">By</span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><a data-hook=\"review-author\" class=\"a-size-base a-link-normal author\" href=\"/gp/pdp/profile/A3E6OGAHL93459/ref=cm_cr_dp_d_pdp?ie=UTF8\">Coco</a></span><span class=\"a-declarative\" data-action=\"cr-popup\" data-cr-popup=\"{&quot;width&quot;:&quot;340&quot;,&quot;title&quot;:&quot;Help&quot;,&quot;url&quot;:&quot;/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=cm_cr_dp_bdg_help?ie=UTF8&amp;nodeId=14279681&amp;pop-up=1#tr&quot;,&quot;height&quot;:&quot;340&quot;}\"></span><span class=\"a-letter-space\"></span><span data-hook=\"review-date\" class=\"a-size-base a-color-secondary review-date\">on November 13, 2014</span></div><div class=\"a-row a-spacing-mini review-data review-format-strip\"><span data-hook=\"format-strip-linkless\" class=\"a-color-secondary\">Format: Kindle Edition</span></div><div class=\"a-row review-data\"><span data-hook=\"review-body\" class=\"a-size-base review-text\"><div aria-live=\"polite\" data-a-expander-name=\"review_text_read_more\" data-a-expander-collapsed-height=\"300\" class=\"a-expander-collapsed-height a-row a-expander-container a-spacing-base a-expander-partial-collapse-container\" style=\"max-height:300px; _height:300px\"><div data-hook=\"review-collapsed\" aria-expanded=\"false\" class=\"a-expander-content a-expander-partial-collapse-content\">Given To Me For An Honest Review<br><br>Rag Dolls: Callie's Story by Shelley Terrell isn't a must read, it's a HAVE to read.  It's so good.  Be sure to have your tissues near by.  It grabs you from page one and holds on to you as the pages turn and turn and turn and turn some more.  They only stop when you get to the end.  While reading about Callie, you will find yourself laughing and crying.  Callie has always been with her Grandma.  When her Grandma dies she is placed in foster care.  She is moved from one foster home to another.  When Callie is fifteen she has a secret --- does she run or does she stay and be killed?  You will feel so many emotions while reading this book: sadness, happiness, disgust and anger.  What happens in the end with Callie?  I'm not telling  .... but be in for a surprise.  I gave this book 5 stars but it truly deserves at least 10+ stars.  I highly recommend it to everyone.  It's a book that you will be reading and re-reading over and over again.  Shelley Terrell hit it out of the park with this book and I look for more from her.</div><div class=\"a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header\" style=\"opacity: 0; display: none;\"><div The story of Callie runs the gauntlet from inspiring and admiration, to tears and disgust.  Shelley did a great job of showing how some of our government agency’s need to revamp their programs, especially the foster care programs.  In some ways the story was predictable with a very surprising twist at the end.  I was gifted this book for an honest review and I want to thank the author for the privilege.  It was a very enjoyable read.</div><div class=\"a-expander-header a-expander-partial-collapse-header\" style=\"opacity: 0; display: none;\"><div class=\"a-expander-content-fade\"></div><a \"undefined\") {for(var i=0; i < suggestions.length; i++) {var displayString = suggestions[i].display; #><#= displayString #><# }} #></div></div></script><script type=\"text/html\" #>\" data-isSc=\"false\" data-isFb=\"false\" data-type=\"<#= type #>\"><span class=\"s-heavy\"><#= bprefix #></span><#= prefix #><span class=\"s-heavy\"><#= suffix #></span><# if (typeof storeHtml ===
